title: Retro Game Monster Sounds
description: A collection of monster sound effects made in a classic style for retro games, contains 120 sounds, including sounds of damage, hits and voices of 10 monsters.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/retro-game-monster-sounds

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/85vjj8th9ko31qc/MSE%20-%20Retro%20Game%20Monster%20Sounds_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The sound pack contains 3 folders - "Damages", "Hits" and "Voices":


  1. In the folder "Damages" you will find sounds of getting damage, pain or hurt - 10 sound effects inside.
  2. "Hits" are sounds of hurting, punching or shooting - 10 sound effects inside.
  3. The "Voices" folder includes 10 monster types with 10 voice sounds for each creature - 100 sound effects inside. These sounds can be used to attack, pain or death a creature.


The types of monsters are listed below:


  1. Demon
  2. Dragon
  3. Giant
  4. Goblin
  5. Orc
  6. Skeleton
  7. Spider
  8. Swamp Creature
  9. Troll
  10. Zombie


All sound effects were designed in a classic retro style.


Use the asset to give life and voice to your creature in your game locations and animation scenes. This sound pack will sound great in your retro game, but don't be afraid to experiment with these sound effects in games of other genres.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 120 retro-style sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 100 voice sounds of monsters
  • 10 damage sounds
  • 10 hit sounds
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 02 minutes 19 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
